# previewValue

**Instance Property**

A value to be shown while previewing the control in the add sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
var previewValue: Self.Value { get }
```

## Discussion

This value should be generated quickly and cheaply. Calculate more expensive and accurate values in [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/ControlValueProvider/currentValue()].
title: previewValue
